settings.text:
Escape to the slopes without leaving your living room with our {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain | metafield_text }} Trail Map Blanket. This isn't just a throw – it's your ticket to powder-filled dreams and epic mountain memories. Imagine wrapping yourself in the softest fleece lining the inside, while the Whistler Trial Map is displayed in crisp detail on the outside. At a generous 60 x 80 inches, it's large enough to share with a fellow ski enthusiast, yet so cozy you might just want to keep it all to yourself.

Bring the mountain home with the officially licensed, up-to-date {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain | metafield_text }} trail map emblazoned across this functional piece of art. Crafted with pride in the USA using cutting-edge technology, this versatile blanket is your all-season companion. From fireside storytelling to summer concerts under the stars, it's ready for any adventure – just like you. Machine washable and stain-resistant, it's as tough as your favorite black diamond run. Don't just dream of the mountains – wrap yourself in them. Add this must-have piece to your cart now and elevate your home's ski lodge vibes!
